text: Ksenia Kimovna Borodina (born Amoyeva) (; born on March 8, 1983) is a Russian television presenter and actress. Since 2004 she is presenter of reality show House 2. == Personal life == From 2008 to 2011, Ksenia was married to businessman Yury Budagov. They have one child together â€” a daughter named Maria Budagova (b. June 10, 2009). From June 2011 to August 2012, Ksenia has been in relationship with now ex-member of House 2 Mikhail Teryokhin. They were engaged just a month before their split. Currently lives with her daughter Maria in Moscow (Russia). July 3, 2015, she married businessman Kurban Omarov. == Other websites == * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Russian entertainers
title: Ksenia Borodina
